Dear Tarek, 

 

Good day! 

 

Further to my below email, please refer to the two options we received from Tawuniya in regards to changing the policy holder.  

 

*	Canceling the existing policy under CHALHOUB GROUP ARABIA LIMITED COMPANY LLC and issue it under CHAUMET ARABIAN LIMITED name. Furthermore, please confirm moving all the locations under the existing policy to the new policy including the new addition and share with us all related compliance documents and confirm NKORL  (KYC,VAT,NA).
*	Instead canceling the existing policy. We can offer to add the CHAUMET ARABIAN LIMITED name under the existing policy and ensure that all related locations will be under it. Invoices will be issued under the main policy name Shalhoub Group. Please note that this option is quicker to implement if the client agrees.

 

Kindly let us have your confirmation to proceed accordingly. 

 

Hamad Balabaid

Senior Account Manager - GL
